Reason: The configuration option 'enablePngCrush' is performance-sensitive. This is because enabling or disabling this option directly impacts the performance and output quality of the image conversion process at the system level. The developer's explanation also indicates that the option triggers the instantiation and addition of the PngCrushProcessor, which can be time-expensive and memory-expensive operations. Therefore, the configuration directly and substantially affects system performance and leads to notable performance variations.
